title: Greater Albion's Release of Adantine and Corvone Imminent
content:
Greater Albion's two latest projects, Adantine and Corvone are at the point of being released on Myfonts.com. In the meantime, here are some samples of the two families in action [on our blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132715/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/2010/01/03/adantine-and-corvone-near-release/).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132715im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Adantine_poster_4904.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132715im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Corvone_Poster_3683.png)
author: Rasendyll

comments.content:
The spacing is a bit off in Corvone in the word REGULAR between E and G , GUL is tight, and you could drive that bus between L and A.

I think you shouldn't be in such a rush to be so prolific. Take a bit of time in the details as they do matter.

Nick Cooke
